item.title: About poison
item.summary: The !gwé plant, from which poison is derived. (L VIII.-7. 6603 rev.).
item.comments: 1) This story is found in Book VIII-7
item.author: |han≠kass'o (Klein Jantje) (VIII)

keyword.subkw: the use of a plant called !gwe for making
